description: HTML file that includes a script defining a JavaScript class 'Calculator' extending 'Service', which registers methods and communicates with a service manager over network.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A JavaScript class extending Service that implements add and sub methods for remote invocation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an array of numbers and resolves with the sum.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Subtracts the second number from the first and resolves with the result.
